basics.name: Aleksander Śleszyński
basics.label: Expert DevOps Engineer & Backend Developer
basics.summary: Expert DevOps Engineer with over 7 years of experience. Passionate about building highly scalable, secure, and resilient systems using Java/Kotlin and Azure/GCP. Proven expertise in process automation, risk management, security best practices, and creating reliable CI/CD pipelines. Mentor and advocate for automation.

highlights: Designed, developed, and maintained backend applications in Kotlin and Java using the Spring Boot framework.
Built event-driven applications leveraging Apache Kafka, including producing and consuming messages, and advanced log analysis.
Managed and deployed microservice applications on OpenShift, including containerization, orchestration, and scaling.
Designed and implemented REST APIs – both exposed and consumed within the organization – including applications with external endpoints consumed by third-party systems.
Contributed to projects involving virtual assistants, GDPR compliance, translation platforms, automation solutions and KYC processes with STP integration.
Established and optimized CI/CD pipelines in Azure DevOps, enhancing delivery speed and reliability.
Implemented and maintained monitoring and alerting solutions in Grafana and Prometheus, enabling proactive incident response.
Addressed IT risk management and compliance topics, ensuring adherence to internal and external regulatory standards.
Developed and maintained Kotlin and Java backend applications using Spring Boot framework.
Dealt with the topics of IT risk and compliance in a highly regulated banking environment.
Participated in projects related to the creation of virtual assistants.
Actively worked within Agile frameworks (Scrum/Kanban), driving collaboration and continuous improvement.
Coached and mentored new team members, fostering knowledge sharing and professional growth.
Developed tools to automate recurring tasks using Python, Bash, and Kotlin.
Transitioned manual processes to fully automated workflows.
Awarded with Annual award from Tribe Lead Application & Support for developing tools to automate recurring tasks.
Local Major Incident Management position with Major Incidents coordination according to ITIL practices.
Single Point of Contact and first-line of IT support for international customers.
Maintained Atlassian Documentation of Service Desk, Incident Management and ING Private Cloud procedures.
System and IT infrastructure monitoring, User Access Management, Change Management and Incident Management process.
Developing and maintaining native Android applications.
